types.html:
histoire ancienne f (uncountable)

  1. ancient history (period of history generally seen as occurring before the Middle Ages, that is, before the fall of the Roman Empire)
    Synonym: Antiquité
  2. (figuratively) water under the bridge, ancient history (that which happened a long time ago and not worth discussing any more)
    C'est de l'histoire ancienne. ― That's ancient history.

See also

[edit]
  • de l'eau a coulé sous les ponts
  • ce qui est fait est fait
trans: water under the bridge, ancient history
